txt.en: The Boar of Everholt is drinking from the stream. You should attack while it is unaware
Instance: The Legend of Folca
The Boar of Everholt has sustained grave injuries and is heading towards the stream.\n\nFollow the Boar of Everholt to ensure that you have finally defeated the great beast.
Verify the Boar of Everholt has succumbed to its wounds
Find the trail of the Boar of Everholt
The Boar of Everholt has sustained grave injuries
The fabled Boar of Everholt has finally been defeated.\n\nDuring the battle, you suffered severe wounds and now fight to retain consciousness.
Follow the trail of the Boar of Everholt to the north
Do not succumb to the wounds suffered during the battle
Continue to follow the trail of the Boar of Everholt to the north
Defeat the Boar of Everholt
'I think that I have spoken enough for one night, [placeholder].'
Meregyth begins to regale you with the tale of King Folca the Hunter and the Boar of Everholt.
The Boar of Everholt is near.\n\nYou should slay the great beast.
The Boar of Everholt is very close.\n\nYou should approach the great creature quietly.
The fabled Boar of Everholt collapses as pain overcomes you from a vicious wound suffered during battle
The wounds prove to be too severe for a hearty warrior like you to overcome
Defeat the Boar of Everholt
The Boar of Everholt has sustained grave injuries
The Boar of Everholt is nearby.\n\nThe Boar's trail leads to the north, towards the sound of running water.
Defeat the Boar of Everholt
Follow the scent of the Boar of Everholt.
The Boar of Everholt has sustained grave injuries
The strong musk of boar wafts in from the north
The musky scent of the Boar draws nearer
